alert.note: Alert for Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:27PM EDT until July 13 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Oneida County in central New York... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 327 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of McKeever to near Floyd, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rome, Trenton, Floyd, Boonville, Forestport, Steuben, Remsen, Holland Patent, Prospect and Barneveld. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
